page.title: 17Mr. Kemp's farm
page.content: Mr. Kemp has 325 sheep, 125 ewes, 200 lambs and 40 bullocks. His favourite crop is cereal_wheat, barley and oats (not so much labour!). His favourite season is harvest, his least favourite is January to March.The animals that live longest on his farm are sheep. His favourite animals are horses. A working horse was the oldest animal on the farm, it was 14-15 (same with the dogs) Mr. Kemp has lived on the farm for 50 years.In that time quite a lot of hedges have come down for the modern machines. He has 200 acres of land:he uses tractors and a combine harvseter. He works 40 hours a week 8 and a half hours a day.In the summer he works longer hours than in the winter. The farm belongs to the Hassobury trust. He has two people to help him. The biggest demand is cereal.The least in demand is oats.
